t five. I agree up to a point. There will always be some things

d at this point.


It would also be useful to point out that keeping state =
between method
invocations doesn't necessarily mean that these methods cann=
ot be invoked in
any order:  just make sure that this state is read-only.  =
And maintaining
state that is expensive to create is a fairly common design=
 pattern in
testing.
